sentences.sentence: In this paper, given the advantage of supercritical fluid fractionation to other fractionations.
sentences.translation: 简要介绍了超临界抽提法相比于其他抽提方法的优势和优点。

sentences.sentence: Their REE abundance increases progressively and their light and heavy REE fractionations also have a general evolutionary trend of becoming more and more marked.
sentences.translation: 其REE丰度逐渐增高，轻、重稀土分馏程度表现为愈趋显著的总体演化趋势。
